titleStmt.title: Inclosure thrown open: or, Depopulation depopulated. Not by spades and mattocks; but, by the word of God, the laws of the land, and solid arguments. And the most material pleas that can be brought for it, considered and answered. / By Henry Halhead.
titleStmt.author: Halhead, Henry.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ja. Cottrel, for Giles Calvert, at the Black Spread-Eagle at the West-end of Paul's,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
